summary: Just letting all my followers know.
title: Just letting all my followers know.
body:
I will be posting a review tomorrow but it will contain NO SPOILERS. I will even have it in the title. 

I will not share spoilers publicly (aka DM me if you want to rave about Endgame with me), and ONLY to those WHO HAVE SEEN THE MOVIE AND ARE REBLOGGING CONTENT WITH PROPER TAGS. 

I WILL NOT ANSWER ASKS ABOUT IT THAT COULD POSSIBLY SPOIL IT.

Yes, I am going to strict about this because I don’t want anyone’s experience to be ruined by people who don’t know how to keep their mouths properly shut. 

I will be keeping my promise of not posting or reblogging spoilers until the middle or end of May. 

Anything I do reblog containing anything endgame spoilers ish will be tagged as such under 

#avengers endgame spoilers and #avengers endgame: spoilers

Like I have been the past month or so.

summary: I just came home from Avengers: Endgame and I'll avoid spoilers for now,as I'm still reeling here,but I have to say a few...
body:
I just came home from Avengers: Endgame and I’ll avoid spoilers for now,as I’m still reeling here,but I have to say a few things!!

-The cast: they’re no longer playing their characters,they ARE their characters and it’s glorious to watch!

-Everyone in the cinema cheering and clapping at some key moments- you won’t miss them,you can’t miss them! ;)

-Tying in so many different things to a perfect perfect ending of a long story magnificently told!

-Avengers. Assemble.

-I need to see it again!!

-‘Nuff said!

summary:
New Post has been published on https://www.pressserbia.com/marvelovi-osvetnici-dosli-kraja-igre/
 Marvelovi „Osvetnici“ došli...
caption:
New Post has been published on https://www.pressserbia.com/marvelovi-osvetnici-dosli-kraja-igre/

Marvelovi „Osvetnici“ došli do „Kraja igre“

Ekipa Studija Marvel u ponedeljak je u Los Anđelesu proslavila završetak snimanja poslednje epizode u sagi od 22 filma koja je postala najunosnija filmska franšiza svih vremena.

Stotine članova filmske industrije, glumci, fanovi i predstavnici medija premijerno su odgledali trosatni akcioni spektakl  “Avengers: Endgame” (Osvetnici: Kraj Igre), a film će se od srede prikazivati u bioskopima širom sveta.

Robert Dauni Džunior (Iron Man), Kris Hemzvort (Thor), Skarlet Džohanson (Black Widow, Crna udovica), Kris Evans (Captain America), Bri Larson (Captain Marvel) i drugi prošetali su ljubičastim tepihom ispod divovskog logoa “Avengers” u “Convention Centru” u Los Anđelesu.

“Uzbuđen sam što ću konačno videti film”, rekao je Pol Rad koji tumači ulogu “Ant-Mana”. Kao ni drugi članovi filmske ekipe ni Rad još nije odgledao završeni film jer je takva politika Studija Marvel.

Rad je rekao da je putovao svetom i promovisao film “trudeći se najbolje što može” bez da je odgledao film, a to je po njegovim rečima “čudno iskustvo. Zato sada, konačno pogledati film je divno”.

Na premijeri su bili i Liam, brat Krisa Hemzvorta i njegova supruga Majli Sajrus.

“Endgame” zaokružuje priču od šest originalnih filma u seriji Avengers – Iron Man, Captain America, Black Widow, Hawkeye, Hulk i Thor.

Događa se nakon prošlogodišnjeg nastavka “Avengers: Infinity War” koji je ostavio ljubitelje u neodumici jer se činilo da su Marvelovi heroji pretvoreni u prah rukom zlog Tanosa kojega igra Džoš Brolin. U “Endgame,” junaci koji su preživeli kuju plan kako ubiti Tanosa i popraviti štetu koju je počinio.

Evans je priznao da je “šest puta proplakao” gledajući film.

Prethodni 21 film u produkciji Studija Marvel koji su u vlasništvu kompanije “Walt Disney” franšize koja je ostvarila najveći profit u istoriji filma, s više od 18,6 milijarde  dolara na bioskopskim blagajnama od 2007.

Iako sa filmom “Endgame” završava saga “Avengers” neki likovi pojaviće se u budućim filmova. “Spider-Man” se tako vraća na ekrane u julu u filmu “Spider-Man: Far from Home.” (Daleko od kuće).

Priprema se i nastavak filma “Black Panther.”

Priprema se i nastavak filma “Black Panther.”

blog.description: A girl who recently gotten into Devil may cry and also loves over watch, Deadly class, sex education, deadpool, marvel, Shazam, anime, good quality memes, archer, Detroit become human, chuck, persona series, comics,American gods, voltron, games, Brooklyn 99, monster prom and RWBY.

tags: is this fate i dont know anymore
we’re all going to suffer emotionally
But we’ll do that together too
summary:
Endgame: *doesn’t come out until 26th April on Friday.*
Me:*getting her hair dip dyed red ombré on Friday at 12:30am*
Also me:...
body:
Endgame: *doesn’t come out until 26th April on Friday.*

Me:*getting her hair dip dyed red ombré on Friday at 12:30am*

Also me: well I’ll be damned the day I’m going to get my heart crushed, my emotions going haywire and getting confused about wanting to laugh or cry the whole 3 hours while also trying not to piss myself followed by an ass that will be sore for sitting on a chair in a dark screening room for 3 hours….I’m totally fine what you talking about.

Again me:

Professional Procrastinator.

A few of my favs: Destiel, Star Wars, Nathan Chen, EXO, BTS, DAY6, lemon-lime suckers, YOI, the color blue, etc.

body:
Signing off until this weekend

Hey yall i know this is basically just an account where i just reblog whatever i want with no consideration for spam because i forget people even follow me, sorry about that. But im just here to let u know im not gonna be on tumblr until AFTER i see avengers endgame cuz ive already seen some almost/maybe spoilers and i dont want that shit. So yeah, bye for a bit, also i may queue a few posts, we’ll see.

summary: No offense but what if Peter Parker got a job as a police officer in the NYPD and was considered the luckiest officier because...
body: No offense but what if Peter Parker got a job as a police officer in the NYPD and was considered the luckiest officier because he kept ‘accidentally’ finding Spider-Man’s webbed up criminals ???

blog.name: rudelarry
blog.title: Love who you love
blog.description: Aada / 23 / Finland / ISFJ / she/her

summary: thoughts on endgame under the cut INCLUDES SPOILERS READ AT YOUR OWN RISK[[MORE]] i really really REALLY liked endgame like it...
body:
thoughts on endgame under the cut INCLUDES SPOILERS READ AT YOUR OWN RISK

i really really REALLY liked endgame like it truly was an amazing ending to the infinity stones saga or what the hell they’re calling it. i loved how the characters seemed looser and more approachable (idk??) than before, even though at times it did feel a bit out of character (i mean, steve cursing SEVERAL TIMES during ONE MOVIE??? love it and i know he curses like a sailor when he’s alone but STILL)

when it comes to the time travelling stuff, it just felt half-assed. nebula shot her past self but nothing happened to the present day nebula? ok she might’ve just injured her but that shot looked pretty lethal to me. also steve ditching his life in the 21st century for a life with peggy in the 50s or whatever but still nothing happened to the present day? how is that possible????

also now that i’m talking about steve, what the hell was that ending??? i’m glad that he didn’t die but i’d actually rather have him dead than going back in time to mess up with peggy’s future (her and sousa were meant to be shut up). also i’m happy that he got his happy ending but still, that was just? lazy writing??? also that “goodbye” to bucky was…. something. i can’t really wrap my head around it since i was crying like a baby because of it but yeah. it wasn’t what i wanted. why would he leave bucky after he got him back? why would he go back in time to live his happy hetero life and at the same time jeopardize bucky’s rescue from hydra, especially since he played a major part in all that??? i’m just confusion and anger.

thor’s beer belly was funny, especially since you could still see his six pack and his moobs were actually just his pecs. also when his hair got styled at the battle field, it looked like cat ears. i love thor.

the most surprising thing for me was me crying so much when tony died. he wasn’t my favorite character, never was, but i can appreciate him and his part in all of the mcu. also rdj has done a terrific job with the character and i just can’t imagine the mcu without him in it. the funeral scene was beautiful, but i have one question: who was that young man standing behind wanda, bucky and sam?

speaking of funerals, where was natasha’s? also why did they kill her off instead of clint? yeah, he has family but that’s literally the only viable reason i have for saving him. no one cares about clint. i’m disappointed and i really hope that black widow movie is actually happening.

all in all, great movie. didn’t feel like three hours. would like to watch it again. cool.
body_abstract: thoughts on endgame under the cut INCLUDES SPOILERS READ AT YOUR OWN RISK

i really really REALLY liked endgame like it truly was an amazing ending to the infinity stones saga or what the hell they’re calling it. i loved how the characters seemed looser and more approachable (idk??) than before, even though at times it did feel a bit out of character (i mean, steve cursing SEVERAL TIMES during ONE MOVIE??? love it and i know he curses like a sailor when he’s alone but STILL)

when it comes to the time travelling stuff, it just felt half-assed. nebula shot her past self but nothing happened to the present day nebula? ok she might’ve just injured her but that shot looked pretty lethal to me. also steve ditching his life in the 21st century for a life with peggy in the 50s or whatever but still nothing happened to the present day? how is that possible????

also now that i’m talking about steve, what the hell was that ending??? i’m glad that he didn’t die but i’d actually rather have him dead than going back in time to mess up with peggy’s future (her and sousa were meant to be shut up). also i’m happy that he got his happy ending but still, that was just? lazy writing??? also that “goodbye” to bucky was…. something. i can’t really wrap my head around it since i was crying like a baby because of it but yeah. it wasn’t what i wanted. why would he leave bucky after he got him back? why would he go back in time to live his happy hetero life and at the same time jeopardize bucky’s rescue from hydra, especially since he played a major part in all that??? i’m just confusion and anger.

thor’s beer belly was funny, especially since you could still see his six pack and his moobs were actually just his pecs. also when his hair got styled at the battle field, it looked like cat ears. i love thor.

the most surprising thing for me was me crying so much when tony died. he wasn’t my favorite character, never was, but i can appreciate him and his part in all of the mcu. also rdj has done a terrific job with the character and i just can’t imagine the mcu without him in it. the funeral scene was beautiful, but i have one question: who was that young man standing behind wanda, bucky and sam?

speaking of funerals, where was natasha’s? also why did they kill her off instead of clint? yeah, he has family but that’s literally the only viable reason i have for saving him. no one cares about clint. i’m disappointed and i really hope that black widow movie is actually happening.

all in all, great movie. didn’t feel like three hours. would like to watch it again. cool.
